article.headline: Rider 82, Canisius 58
article.story: BUFFALO, N.Y. (AP) -- Jason Thompson scored 25 points and grabbed 13 rebounds as Rider beat Canisius 82-58 Saturday night. Thompson was 11-of-15 from the field and 3-of-4 from the foul line. His 878 career rebounds passed Dick Kuchen for the all-time school mark. Ryan Thompson had 14 points, 4 rebounds and 4 assists. Harris Mansell scored 13 points, and Justin Robinson had 12 points and four steals for Rider (6-4, 1-1 MAAC). Julius Coles led Canisius (0-8, 0-2 MAAC) with 13 points and 4 rebounds. Rider scored 18 first half points off 10 Golden Griffin turnovers with eight steals. The Broncs shot 54.5 percent in the half and 55.9 percent for the game. Jason Thompson's thundering alley-oop slam dunk gave Rider a 39-30 lead with 2:37 left. The Broncs then went on a 10-3 run to take a 49-33 lead at halftime and led by as much as 21 in the game.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
